00035 namespace affymetrix_calvin_io
00036 {
00037 
00038 class DataGroupHeader
00039 {
00040 public:
00041         
00042         DataGroupHeader();
00043         DataGroupHeader(const std::wstring &n);
00044         ~DataGroupHeader();
00045 
00046 private:
00047 
00048         /*! data dataGroup name */
00049         std::wstring name;
00050         /*! file position of the 1st data dataSet */
00051         u_int32_t dataSetPos;
00052         /*! file position of the next dataGroup */
00053         u_int32_t nextGrpPos;
00054         /*! file position of the start of the data group header */
00055         u_int32_t headerStartFilePos;
00056         /*! data dataSets in this dataGroup */
00057         DataSetHdrVector dataSetHdrs;
00058 
00059 public:
00060 
00061         /*!  */
00062         void Clear();
00063         /*!  */
00064         void SetName(const std::wstring &p);
00065         /*!  */
00066         std::wstring GetName() const;
00067         /*! Get the data set count */
00068         int32_t GetDataSetCnt() const;
00069         /*!  */
00070         void AddDataSetHdr(const DataSetHeader &p);
00071 
00072         /*!Replace a data set header with a new data set header of the same name.
00073          * @param new data set header with the same name as the header it replaces.
00074         */
00075         void ReplaceDataSetHdr(const DataSetHeader &p);
00076 
00077         /*!  */
00078         DataSetHeader& GetDataSet(int32_t index);
00079         /*!  */
00080         const DataSetHeader& GetDataSetConst(int32_t index) const;
00081         /*!  */
00082         void GetDataSetIterators(DataSetHdrIt &begin, DataSetHdrIt &end);
00083 
00084         /*! Set the file position of the start of the DataSet header.
00085          *      The value set here is not written to the file.
00086          */
00087         void SetHeaderStartFilePos(u_int32_t pos) { headerStartFilePos = pos; }
00088 
00089         /*! Get the file position of the start of the DataSet header. */
00090         u_int32_t GetHeaderStartFilePos() const { return headerStartFilePos; }
00091 
00092 /*! Set the file position of the DataSet header.
00093 *  The value set here is not necessarily the value written to the file.
00094 */
00095         void SetDataSetPos(u_int32_t pos) { dataSetPos  = pos; }
00096         /*! Get the file position of the DataSet header. */
00097         u_int32_t GetDataSetPos() const { return dataSetPos; }
00098         /*! Set the file position of the next DataGroup header. */
00099         void SetNextGroupPos(u_int32_t pos) { nextGrpPos  = pos; }
00100         /*! Get the file position of the next DataGroup header. */
00101         u_int32_t GetNextGroupPos() const { return nextGrpPos; }
00102         /*!
00103          */
00104         affymetrix_calvin_io::DataSetHeader* FindDataSetHeader(const std::wstring& dataSetName);
00105 };

00107 /*! vector of DataGroupHeaders */
00108 typedef std::vector<DataGroupHeader> DataGroupHdrVector;

00110 typedef std::vector<DataGroupHeader>::iterator DataGroupHdrIt;

00112 typedef std::vector<DataGroupHeader>::const_iterator DataGroupHdrConstIt;
